content: Hi (happy new year!) I'm trying to use Intake ESM to access data on AWS. How do I find the different catalogues? Or do I have to create a new one myself?

Happy New Year Mari!

Generally there should be existing intake catalogs for the NCAR AWS holdings. Here are a couple of example notebooks showing how to find/use the catalogs that are publicly available:

https://github.com/NCAR/cesm-lens-aws/blob/main/notebooks/using-intake-catalog.ipynb

https://github.com/NCAR/na-cordex-aws/blob/main/notebooks/plot-zarr-diagnostics.ipynb

Amazon has encouraged data providers to include examples when possible.
